thread.title: Louise Mitchell's rage as Bex gets close to Travis in EastEnders | Metro News
thread.title_full: Louise Mitchell's rage as Bex gets close to Travis in EastEnders | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Louise Mitchell's rage as Bex gets close to Travis in EastEnders | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 11:58 pm (Picture: BBC) 
There has been some significant tension rising between best pals Louise Mitchell and Bex Fowler of late – and now it seems like another boy, Travis Law-Hughes, is going to come between them. 
Louise’s growing dependence on her friendships with scheming Alexandra and Madison has pushed Bex out and the close knit pals have started to bicker more. Meanwhile, Louise has continued to insist that their friendship won’t survive if Bex has contact with Shakil Kazemi, forcing loyal Bex to sacrifice her romance for her friend. 
But when she develops a friendship with Travis, the boy Louise developed a crush on at her drama club, things turn sour again. (Picture: BBC) 
It’s Shakil who spots Bex with Travis and, from a distance, it seems like they are pretty close. Shakil was on his way to speak with Bex after a pep talk from his older brother Kush. But he is disappointed to see Bex chatting happily with Travis and feels he has missed his chance. (Picture: BBC) 
As gossip reaches Alexandra and Madison that Bex may have a new romance, they can’t resist sharing it with Louise in order to deliberately stir up a feud between the pair. (Picture: BBC) 
Louise takes the bait and is left furious, marching over to confront a shocked Bex over moving in on the boy she likes. (Picture: BBC) 
Will Bex admit that there is something going on with her and Travis or are they simply just friend? (Picture: BBC) 
And can Louise and Bex’s friendship survive this latest clash? 
One to watch: Thursday 16th February on BBC One at 7:30pm.
